We would like to get an approximate count of the number of thinkBIG! Challenge entries that will be submitted from your school.  School partners are expected to submit at least 2 entries into the Challenge.

fields.label: We would like to get an approximate count of the number of students who will compete in the thinkBIG! Challenge. Students may work solo or in teams of up to 4 students.
fields.description: How many students from your school will participate in the Challenge? Please provide an estimate.

fields.label: We would like to get an approximate count of the number of students who will attend the thinkBIG! Summit. The Summit will take place on Tuesday, February 27, 2018 at the Tinkham Veale University Center at Case Western Reserve University. The Summit begins at 8:30am and concludes around 6:00pm
fields.description: How many students from your school will attend thinkBIG! Summit? Please provide an estimate.

fields.label: thinkBIG! School Partners will be recognized in event materials. Please send a copy of your school logo to Cynthia Bailie at cbailie@vealefound.org. Or, provide a website address (URL) below where copies of your school logo for use by thinkBIG! can be found.
